dataList.name: Cetacean Strand
dataList.desc: Whale of the Porous Hand takes damage when this unit is defeated.

dataList.name: Connected Pain
dataList.desc:
Upon death, deal 10 damage to connected Mermaids. Then, apply 2 Damage Up next turn.
This effect cannot drop the connected Mermaids' HP below 1.

dataList.name: Easy Breathing
dataList.desc: If this unit has <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Poise</color></link></u>, gain 5 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Poise</color></link></u> upon Clash Win.

dataList.name: Two Sides Of a Coin
dataList.desc:
Every turn, if the first Coin 'Heads Hits', gain 1 Damage Up next turn.
If the first Coin 'Tails Hits', gain 1 Damage Down next turn.

dataList.name: Ain't That a Prick?
dataList.desc: On Hit, if target has <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Bleed</color></link></u>, regain SP equal to <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Bleed</color></link></u> on target

dataList.name: To the Front Lines!!
dataList.desc: When gaining Protection, gain 1 additional <sprite name="Protection"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Protection">Protection</color></link></u> if this unit's Speed is at 1

dataList.name: Ain't That a Prick?
dataList.desc: On Hit, if target has <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Bleed</color></link></u>, regain SP equal to <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Bleed</color></link></u> on target

dataList.name: Two Sides Of a Coin
dataList.desc:
Every turn, if the first Coin 'Heads Hits', gain 2 Damage Up and 1 Attack Power Up next turn.
If the first Coin 'Tails Hits', gain 2 Damage Down and 1 Attack Power Down next turn.

dataList.name: No... Get Away From Me!
dataList.desc: Upon Clash Lose, gain 4 Poise and 3 Poise Count.

dataList.name: Huzzah, Men!
dataList.desc:
On Critical Hit, gain 1 Plus Coin Boost next turn.
Heal 15 SP on self.
All other allies heal 10 SP.
(Activates once per turn)

dataList.name: What Are You Doing?!
dataList.desc: Being captured in this encounter causes all allies to lose 30 SP

dataList.name: Ain't That a Prick?
dataList.desc: If target has <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Bleed</color></link></u> On Hit, regain SP equal to <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Bleed</color></link></u> on target
